author: Amanda Ferguson
title: Stormont introduces ‘extraordinary powers’ after 15th Covid-19 death
description: Restrctions on movement come into force after another 49 positive tests recorded
content:
Sweeping powers to restrict the movement of people to help curb the spread of coronavirus in Northern Ireland come into force from 11pm.
In a statement issued on Saturday night, the Stormont Executive said it had agreed to adopt the powers in response to the… [+5440 chars]
